      • createHttpContext

        protected HttpContext createHttpContext(org.springframework.http.HttpMethod httpMethod,
                                        URI uri)
        从类复制的说明: org.springframework.http.client.HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory
        Template methods that creates a HttpContext for the given HTTP method and URI.

        The default implementation returns null.

        覆盖:
        createHttpContext 在类中 org.springframework.http.client.HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactory
        参数:
        httpMethod - the HTTP method
        uri - the URI
        返回:
        the http context
